Items.Text: Status bar with app version and current time
Changelog viewer + admin-only editor
Auto-sync of changelog.json from install folder to user profile
Layout of Single-player / Multi-player tabs (proper Dock/Anchor behavior)
“Mods” group: listbox now fills the frame correctly
DataGridViewComboBoxCell value is not valid when adding a new row
Content no longer overlaps with the status bar on various DPIs
Initial setup with all CORE features
client path fix (Steam) - solution for Steam versions
Adjusting App version for auto updater
Production version is now visible in footer of application
Updater shows a progress dialog during download and extraction.
Updater now preserves user configuration files (configs.json, sp_configs.json, filters_global.json, config.json); only changelog.json from the release is overwritten.
Changelog editor supports time selection (DateTime); dates are stored as 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.
Progressbar, due to wide GUI
Added new GUI - loading GIF as overlay when updating application
Horizontal scrolling for panel_SP_info and pnl_Server_Info when content exceeds the panel width.
Unified fit-to-width resize: labels now wrap (MaximumSize), other controls are no longer forcibly shrunk to panel width.
Auto-maximize Form1 on small screens (below ~1400×900).
Right-side actions (e.g., Open/Edit/Show) were inaccessible on narrow displays; now reachable via horizontal scroll.
Central ReloadAllUserConfigs() to reload configs.json, sp_configs.json, filters_global.json, paths.json, and optional config.json in one shot.
Automatic reload of all user configs on app startup and again right after the update check completes.
ChangeLogEditor now propagates changelog.json to the project root and to Content/ automatically on Save (for update packaging).
PathSettingsService now supports ReloadFromDisk() to re-read paths.json without restarting the app.
Missing/empty Id values in configs.json are auto-generated and persisted during reload.
Stale paths after in-place updates; paths are now reloaded from disk to prevent mismatches.
Reload errors are caught and shown as a single warning dialog so startup isn’t blocked.
UI refresh hooks: MP/SP lists and filter selectors are reliably refreshed after a reload.
Dynamic project-root discovery (no hard-coded paths) when copying changelog.json.
Post-update launch now requests Administrator via UAC; if declined, app falls back to non-elevated start.
Update script starts the new version with --post-update argument for future post-update hooks.
Overlay is hosted directly on the form with Dock=Fill and recalculates layout on every resize.
Update overlay (spinner + text) is now perfectly centered on all window sizes and in maximized mode.
Loading spinner is now perfectly centered on all window sizes and DPI scales.
Spinner size scales dynamically with window size for consistent look.
Post-update launch now starts the new version as Administrator and with the correct working directory.
Config files failing to load immediately after auto-update due to wrong working directory.
Paths to configs. From now they will be located in %Appdata%
